examples: In an ultra-realistic fashion photography style featuring light blue and pale amber tones, an astronaut in a spacesuit walks through the fog.
prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: Text prompt for video generation, max 2000 characters

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: Duration of the video in seconds

aspect_ratio.title: Aspect Ratio
aspect_ratio.description: The aspect ratio of the output video

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed for reproducibility. If None, a random seed is chosen.

audio.title: Audio
audio.description: Whether to use direct audio-video generation. When true, outputs video with sound.

video.title: Video
video.description: The generated video from text using the Q3 model

file_size.title: File Size
file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

file_name.title: File Name
file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.

content_type.title: Content Type
content_type.description: The mime type of the file.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.
